items.name: Earth N°1
items.description: Icy tendrils cling to the skeletal remains of urban progress, a frozen testament to a world in silent aftermath.

items.name: Earth N°2
items.description: Morning light whispers over the icy tomb of civilization, where once the bustle of life thrived now stands a chilling hush.

items.name: Earth N°3
items.description: The sun graces the frost-laden edifices of humanity’s hubris, offering no warmth to the cold desolation of regret.

items.name: Earth N°4
items.description: A car, once a symbol of freedom, now lies shackled in the relentless grip of an eternal winter’s embrace.

items.name: Earth N°5
items.description: A convoy of icy relics, stand in silent parade amidst the frozen breath of Earth’s desolate sigh.

items.name: Earth N°6
items.description: The urban graveyard sprawls into the horizon, with icy shrouds enveloping the echoes of a silenced world.

items.name: Earth N°7
items.description: Beneath a crystal cloak, a lone car rests, a frosty epitaph to the stillness that has befallen the Earth.

items.name: Earth N°8
items.description: A blanket of frost encases remnants of a rush hour frozen in time, an arctic echo of once warmer days.

items.name: Earth N°9
items.description: Nature’s icy fingers clasp over the remains of humanity's haste, a chilling reminder of the planet’s stoic indifference.
